articles.content: Even Microsoft, itself affected in the hack, called for action. Brad Smith, president of Microsoft, said it is not espionage as usual it is an act of recklessness and called for reckoning. He added t… [+2059 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Zamira Hajiyeva: Supreme Court rejects appeal to overturn 'McMafia' unexplained wealth order - Sky News
articles.description: Court documents previously revealed how Mrs Hajiyeva had spent £16m in Harrods in a decade, including £600,000 in a single day.
